title: Himi 23
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Vakai ki he ‘Eiki lelei
Ko hotau Huhu’i,
Na’e pekia mamahi,
Ke tau mo’ui ai.
2.
Na’e hilifaki ia
Ki he funga ‘akau,
Ko e hifo angatonu
‘I he ‘etau hia.
3.
Na’e lahi ‘ene ‘ofa
Kia kitautolu,
Na’a mate ‘angaua
Hotau laumālie.
4.
Pea tangi le’o lahi
Ki he’ene Tamai,
Pea toki tuku hake
Hono laumālie.
5.
Pea toki punou hifo
‘A hono fofonga,
Pea pekia ‘a Sīsū
Ko hotau fetongi.
6.
Ka te ne motuhi vave
Hono ha’isia
‘E he mate, pea hao
Pea nāunāu’ia.
7.
‘E Lami ‘a e ‘Otua
‘Oku pehe ni fau,
Ha mamahi pe ha ‘ofa
‘O hangē ko koe. *
